DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy urine biomarker patient interstitial cystitis/painful bladder syndrome
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy Urine Biomarker Patient With Interstitial Cystitis/Painful Bladder Syndrome ( Pilot Study )
DOC.criteria: 1. must experience bladder pain , urinary urgency frequency least 6 month prior entry study 2 . Pain VAS > 4 3 . PUF score > 13 4 . ICQ score > 12 4 ) cystoscopic record within 2years 1 . Patients pregnancy , childbearing age without contraception 2 . Patient microscopic hematuria , exclude evidence neoplastic tumor examination 3. patient urine culture show evidence urinary tract infection 1month prior study 4 . Accompanied medical problem Tuberculosis urinary system Bladder cancer , urethral cancer , Prostate cancer Recurrent cystitis Anatomical disorder 5 . Patients prior surgery ( bladder augmentation , cystectomy ) 6 . Patients neurologic disorder 7 . Patients indwell catheter intermittent selfcatheterization 8 . Patients psychological problem
